entry.title: About Me
entry.summary:
About Me

I love programming, instrumental music, messing with my GNU/Linux distro, thinking about recursion, sometimes playing with simulators, love to read books (you shall not pass) and mangas, sometimes watching animes (I'll recommend you to watch One Piece if you never did), brocolli, simple cooking recipes, living frugally â€¦
entry.content:
About Me

I love programming, instrumental music, messing with my GNU/Linux distro, thinking about recursion, sometimes playing with simulators, love to read books (you shall not pass) and mangas, sometimes watching animes (I'll recommend you to watch One Piece if you never did), brocolli, simple cooking recipes, living frugally..
